titleStmt.title: Hereafter foloweth a compendyous regyment or a dyetary of helth made in Mou[n]tpyllier, compyled by Andrew Boorde of physiycke doctour, dedycated to the armypotent prynce, and valyaunt Lorde Thomas Duke of Northfolche.
Compendyous regyment or a dyetary of helth

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge in seynt Martyns parysshe besyde charynge Crosse, at the sygne of seynt Iohn Euangelyste. for Iohn Gowghe],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; actual publication date from STC.
